definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[חטר]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. xat.ara lash with the tail, move spear up and down, shake, quiver (said of spear), etc.; Aram. h.uwt.ro0, [[חוּטְרָא]], As. ḫutartu, all = staff, Schr:COT Gloss and on 2Ki 9:2; [[חטר]] sceptre, Inscr. Zinj. DHM:Sendsch. 57; on format. v. Lag:BN 144).
